title: gpa
content: messed up chem cycle so bad will end up with a 7.7, maybe if i work hard can get an 8 or 8.5 is that enough for cs placements?

comments.body: Yes 8.5 is good enough for placements
You still have 5 sems left, so chill, work hard in next sems to raise your gpa, individual sem gpa inst considered anywhere.
